snippet: In roughly 15,000 comments published on seven editorials, readers were far more supportive of ending the federal ban on marijuana than the average American.
abstract: Juliet Lapidos Editorial Observer examines reactions of readers of The New York Times to series published by Editorial Board calling for end to federal ban on marijuana; notes that, by and large, readers seemed to support legalization (Series: High Time).
lead_paragraph: In roughly 15,000 comments published on seven editorials, readers were far more supportive of ending the federal ban on marijuana than the average American.

headline.print_headline: Times Readers Online Make Their Own Cases for Legalizing Marijuana
headline.main: Times Readers Online Make Their Own Cases for Legalizing Marijuana
